memories.content:
Open Lovable project analysis:
- Next.js 15 React app with TypeScript
- AI-powered sandbox builder using E2B, creates React apps in sandboxes
- Uses AI providers: OpenAI (GPT-5), Anthropic (Sonnet), Groq (Kimi K2)
- Main dependencies: E2B for sandboxes, Firecrawl for scraping, AI SDK
- Key commands: npm run dev (--turbopack), npm run build, npm run lint
- Test commands exist but no test files implemented yet
- Config in config/app.config.ts controls E2B timeouts, AI models, Vite settings
- Global state management for sandboxes, conversation context, file caches
- Complex streaming architecture for AI code generation and application
